meanings.definition: A visual image produced by an ultrasound examination.
meanings.sent1: The doctor showed me the sonograms of my baby during the ultrasound.
meanings.sent2: The sonograms helped the doctor see inside my body without surgery.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the sonograms of my stomach made it look like a mysterious cave.
meanings.sent4: The sonograms revealed a hidden world within me, like a secret map.
meanings.sent5: The sonograms were like magic pictures that showed what couldn't be seen.

meanings.definition: The process of producing a visual image using ultrasound technology.
meanings.sent1: The sonograms were created by the ultrasound machine in the hospital.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use sonograms to help diagnose medical conditions in patients.
meanings.sent3: The sonograms seemed like a high-tech peek into the body's secrets.
meanings.sent4: Ultrasound technology turns the body into a canvas for sonograms to paint.
meanings.sent5: The sonograms were like snapshots of the body's inner workings.
